name: Pakhan
thoughts: Good damage roll with Meticulous and Determined. The talents are decent for PvE, decide what you want to re-roll. You could use Meticulous to have more sustained damage. In that case, re-roll Determined for Destructive if you can't activate it. Meticulous for Destructive would be the other option.

name: Custom M870 MCS
thoughts: Really high damage roll. I'd re-roll Competent for Responsive.

name: Tactical ACR
thoughts: This one is for someone that needs a decent AR. You can re-roll Fierce for Ferocious, Responsive or Determined and have a great combo for PvE.

name: Enhanced PP-19
thoughts: Expensive on DZ funds but could be worth buying for a D3 build. You can re-roll Unforgiving for Destructive if PvE Predatory for Deadly if PvP.

name: Russian Red Dot Sight
thoughts: Good scope for Shotguns if you want a tigher spread. They also look pretty cool on them.

name: Ti-RANT Suppressor
thoughts: Excellent suppressor for SMGs and Pistols with max CHC, CHD and HSD. Must buy.

name: Omega Rifle Suppressor - Tan
thoughts: It's the Tan variant (fashion police) but the rolls are pretty nice for all kinds of weapons.

name: Extended Magazine
thoughts: Almost max size with RoF but CHD instead CHC.

name: VX-1 scope (12x)
thoughts: Just half a point of CHC aways from being an absolute god roll. Must buy.

name: Small Laser Pointer
thoughts: Only mod that fits on pistols but can also be used with MDR or MMRs to have a faster reticle without giving up HSD in the scope and muzzle.

name: SR-7 Suppressor
thoughts: A decent roll for those speccing into CHC and CHD, specially for PM buils in PvP.

name: Loud Vent Brake
thoughts: Good rolls, not great. Best mod optio for SMGs.

name: PEQ-15 Laser - Green
thoughts: Excellent rolls for MDR or MMRs if you want more accuracy.

name: Refreshed Mask
thoughts: If you're running a HE build this is a nice mask you can use. Re-roll CHC for EAD.

name: Vigorous Chest
thoughts: Decent Vigorous chest if you need one. Max out the main stat or switching it around.

name: Accomplished Knee Pads
thoughts: Good buy for Field Proficiency Caches farming. Re-roll Health or the main stat.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: 3% Skill Haste and almost max ELE.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: 3% Skill Haste and almost max FA.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: 5.5% Ally Heal, .5% off the max of 6% but still good to pick up for healer builds.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: 3% DtE, great mods for ELE PvE builds.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: 7.5% max Support Station Range, great for reclaimer builds.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: 3,322 almost max Skill Power, great mods for ELE builds.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: 3% DtE, great mods for PvE builds if you dont already have DtE mods.
